mng: to extinguish, to put out (fire), to quench, to stop burning, to go out (of fire, lamp etc), to come to an end, to wither away, to die out, Taiwan pr. [xi2]

exm.mng: to extinguish, to put out (fire), to quench, to stop burning, to go out (of fire, lamp etc), to come to an end, to wither away, to die out, Taiwan pr. [xi2]
to stop burning, to go out (of fire), to die out, extinguished
(of fire, lamp etc) to go out, to put out (fire), (fig.) to die down, (of a vehicle) to stall
turn out the lights, lights out
